TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty class represents a schema property definition that is contained in the schema partition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that specifies the context for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object that was created to the Active Directory Domain Services.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that gets or sets the CN of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that gets or sets a description of the current <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty FindByName(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that specifies the context for the search.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema property to search for.
Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object for the schema property that is found. `null` if the property is not found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object that represents the directory entry for the schema property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object is defunct.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the current schema property object is defunct. `true` if the object is defunct; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the ANR set.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property is in the ANR set. `true` if it is in the ANR set; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the current schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store. `true` if the property is indexed; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog. `true` if it is contained in the global catalog; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the tombstone object that contains deleted properties.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the tombstone object. `true` if it is contained in the tombstone object; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is single-valued.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property is single valued. `true` if it is single-valued; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether there is a tuple index for this schema property.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether the schema property has a tuple index. `true` if there is a tuple index for the property; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> that links to the current schema property.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object that is linked to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value for the link identifier when the schema property is linked.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that represents the linkID value when the schema property is linked. For more information, see the topic [Link-ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_linkid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

Docs.summary: Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object. For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> value that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object. For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the OID of the schema property.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> value that contains the OID of the current <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum value or length that the schema property can have.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> that represents the minimum value or length of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object value.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum value or length that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object can have.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that indicates the maximum value or length of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object to the underlying directory store.

Gets or sets the schemaIDGuid for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object. For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Guid"> that represents the schemaIDGuid for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object. For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"> object indicating the property type (syntax) of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"> object that defines the property type of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the LDAP display name of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object.
